info.name: File actions
info.summary: Scripting tool which allows administrators to expand the file options menu.
info.description:
Allows administrators to write small scripts which users can run through via the file actions menu in the Files app!
- **🌕 Lua:** Script in Lua, its simple and has plenty of online resources. - **⚡️Empower users:** Make hard tasks easy, straight from the Files app. - **🙋 Open to suggestions:** Are you missing a function in the scripting API? Open an issue on Github! - **🤖 Integration with Nextcloud Flow:** allows you to fully automate workflows
⚠️**Attention** Scripts may modify and delete files permanently. Take care and make sure to read the documentation thoroughly before scripting.
info.author: Raul Ferreira Fuentes
